New Records: Rohit Sharma is 147 runs away from reaching 4000 T20I runs.
Mohammad Nabi needs 123 runs and 8 wickets to complete a double of 2000 runs and 100 wickets in T20Is.
Axar Patel is five wickets short of 50 T20I wickets.
Key Match Events: India lost the toss for the 11th consecutive time.
Rohit Sharma's performance was crucial for India's win despite the challenges of T20 cricket.
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma and Yashasvi Jaiswal are India's first-choice openers in T20Is.
Shubman Gill may take Kohli's place in the third position due to his improved powerplay strike rate.
Afghanistan's team setup includes Ibrahim Zadran as captain and the return of key players like Mujeeb Ur Rahman and Fazalhaq Farooqi.
Post-Match Reflections: Rahul Dravid highlighted Rinku Singh's potential as a finisher.
Ibrahim Zadran emphasized Afghanistan's focus on improving their batting skills.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Mohali's pitch favors the chasing team, with a 26-14 win record in the last 40 T20s.
The slight fog and dropping temperature could affect the game.
